mapper.insert: insert into boardattach(uuid, uploadPath, fileName, image,bno) value(#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{image},#{bno});
mapper.select: select max(a.uuid), a.uploadpath, a.filename,a.image,a.bno , b.content from boardattach a right outer join board b on a.bno=b.bno where b.bno = #{bno}
